sect2.title: iInclusiveLess
sect2.para: <= is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. The Inclusive Less than operator is a comparison operator. It compares the left and right values. If the left value is less than or equal to the right value, the operator returns true, otherwise it returns false.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Manager add { Manager_ID <= Employee_ID Greater};
Manager_ID Employee_ID Greater ---------- ----------- ------- 1 2 True 1 3 True 2 4 True 2 6 True 4 5 True
